website_summaries.verdict: A must-have for anyone who enjoys sampling a variety of craft beers, as the shapes and styles are made to match brew aromas, flavors, and frothy tops.
pros: An interesting assortment of glasses designed for different types of beers, from ales to stouts
Shapes are made to bring out specific qualities of craft beers
A great gift for beer enthusiasts
cons: Though they have a sturdy feel, the glass could be a bit thicker

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT buy through amazon!!!
